text: "The Guns of Brixton" is a 1979 song by The Clash and was originally taken from their third studio album London Calling. It has reggae sounding song and was written by Paul Simonon who grew up in Brixton. It was released as a single in 1990 as Return to Brixton and when to number 57 in the United Kingdom. It was covered by Jimmy Cliff in 2011. ==References== Category:1979 songs Category:The Clash songs Category:Jimmy Cliff songs
title: The Guns of Brixton
